title: TOSHIBA U50 Series 126 cm (50 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart TV with Dolby Vision & ATMOS  (50U5050)

product_specification.In The Box: Remote: 1U, Manual: 1U Table Stand: 1U, Wall Mount: 1U Warranty Card: 1U, Batteries: 2U
product_specification.Other Video Features: Dolby Vision HDR, CEVO 4K HDR, Ultra Dimming, HDR10, HLG, 4K Resolution+ Upscaler, Color Remaster, Active Motion Resolution+, Super Contrast Booster, Dynamic Mode, Picture Optimizer
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, Theater, Sports, Music, Speech, Late Night
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Prime Video, Yupp TV, Hungama Play and More
product_specification.Content Providers: Netflix, YouTube, Prime Video, Hungama Play, Dailymotion, AccuWeather, Plex, App Store, YuppTV, TV Browser, Game Center, WoW TV
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Screen Mirroring, Toshiba App store, Alexa Built-in, Unlimited VOD content
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Ethernet LAN In, AV In, Browser, HDMIx3, HDMI 2.0 (All HDMIs), CEC (HDMI1), USBx2, Digital Audio Out
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Direct App Access Hotkeys, Bluetooth Voice Remote, Dolby Vision, Dolby Atmos, Lag free performance
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship Defects Only. Part and Labour Cost are Covered. Please Refer In-packing Warranty Card for More Details.
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does not Include Plastic Parts and Remote Control. Damage Resulting from Accidents, Misuse, Abuse, Act of God, Lightning, Abnormal Voltage, Tempering or Failure of the Purchaser to Follow the Normal Procedure Outlined in the User Manual. Defect of Damage Due to Spillage of Liquids or Wrong Use of Electrical Supply and Voltage. Damage Resulting from Normal Wear and Tear, Corrosion, Rusting and Stains. Damage Resulting from Breaking of LED Screen or Plastic Parts. Installation or Repair Work is Carried Out by Persons or Agency Other than Authorized by the Company. Site (Premises Where the Product is Kept) Conditions that Do not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Product. Original Serial Number is Removed, Obliterated or Altered from the Product. LCD or LED Panels May have Few Bad or Dead Pixels. This is Not a Sign of Malfunction.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Dolby Vision HDR: The cinema-technology inspired Dolby Vision HDR featured in this Toshiba TV delivers your favourite content in colours that are highlighted to up to 40 times brighter than the standard quality. The blacks in the images are displayed up to 10 times darker to create lifelike images that will make you wonder if you are looking at the real thing or the screen of a TV.
product_description.Dolby Atmos for Sound That Is Realistic: Enjoy an immersive aural experience with the DOLBY ATMOS feature of this Toshiba Smart TV. This technology takes your listening experience a step ahead of stereo, and even surround sound to make the sounds of people, places, things, and music come alive.

review: I m using this tv from last 8 month and my experience was not to good and toshiba promise us at the time of launched for updates ( Disney hot start, sony live ) and many more but may 21 almost gone but no updates provide ...

Very nice brightness and great picture quality. Colour s are also punchy and vivid. Overall, excellent tv with excellent picture quality in view of brightness, sharpness and colour management. 4 K PICTURE QUALITY IS SUPERB, UNBEATABLE AND LIKE TOP BRANDS. I M VERY VERY HAPPY WITH THIS TV. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

The TV doesn't support apps like Hostar, Zee5, HoiChoi, etc. It only supports Netflix, Prime, Hungama and YouTube. The TV runs on VIDAA OS, and that doesn't support other apps. I would strongly suggest to avoid buying TV that runs on such a niche OS, it's too late for me but not for you.

Picture & Sound Quality wise it's very good and on par with expectation but not as smart as it claims to be.

I watched numerous videos before finalizing Toshiba 43 U50 series, have had come across with both positive and negative reviews, but most of the reviews were positive with bit of cons which is obvious considering the unit price.. below is my experience post using it for a day.

Display 5/5 - some time is too bright
Sound 4/5 - vocals are aren't clear, bass is heavy but treble is less
Connectivity 4/5 - though it's single band WiFi, had no issues while streaming videos on Netflix and Prime on ultra hd resolution, however 4K videos were buffering on YouTube , but @1440 runs without buffering
Software 4/5 - Very smooth but looks kinda old dated , but who cares, android lovers will hate it. Boot up speed is blazing fast.
PS4 - Playes GTA IV , GOW , Star wars etc etc , runs pretty smooth and experience is outstanding.

Summary : I would recommend Toshiba U50 for those who are looking for best/budget 4k TV with superb picture quality with bezel less design.

Best Display Experience, stunning in the under 4K
Dolby sound is almost good
Worth for money
Flipkart service is Better and pakka Timings
Insatallation also same day 👌👍

Nice TV, Good Display and easy User Interface.
Best buy at this price point.
Tv's speaker output doesn't distort even at full volume.
Very very good quality. Thanks TOSHIBA

Very Good Quality television. Only two drawback which I found are 1. Alexa has no use it works for opening and closing of app for which dedicated buttons are also given in remote which appears more practical. Within app interface of Alexa is not given.-VERY IMPORTANT to note before buying
2. Hotstar missing
3. TV remote works only when you point it towords tv after 2 months uses. When it was new that was not the case

Except this all the things are good and I love the TV.
Also my review is not added till now by Flipkart. It seems that Flipkart adds product reviews of their choice. That is why my review not added even after 20 days of submitting it

One of the fantastic product. Picture quality, Sound quality, connectivity, Bluetooth connectivity. Worth every penny. But when it comes to installation team from Jeeves, it's worst. When They visited my house for installation, they bought separate wall mounting stand, they tried hard to sell it to me by saying one or the other negetive things about inbox provided wall mounting stand. When dint buy the product they showed less interest in fixing my TV. Finally they made it table top and went.
Jeeves team is more interested in selling Wall mounting stand and extended warranty plan not in proper installation of the product.. company should seriously concentrate on these issues
One of the best tv right now in market free installation and a free mount stand also and price is very good

Amazing and excellent purchase. Lovely look. Sound and picture quality very good. Delivered the TV very carefully. Very next day jeeves technician called me for installation. Overall lovely purchase, I loved it. Thank you flipcart.

Recommendation; just buy mi tv box 4k to enjoy disney hotstar in 4k.... And make it an android tv. Or wait for 5 months to get updates.

I've got the 55 inch variant and these are my thoughts after using for a month

- Great PQ with acceptable levels of blacks but blooming visible at times when watching extreme dark scenes. So micro dimming is definitely just a gimmick.
- 30W speaker is good enough and is very clear so soundbar isn't a necessity.
- Upscaling is good and SD content looks very good on this tv.
- OS gets a lot of flak but they fail to mention the fast bootup times (under 15 seconds) which is a huge pro for me. I was fed up of long booting times on Android TV in the past. I rather get an Android box/stick than having an Android TV. This is just a subjective opinion so not everyone might agree with me on this point.

Overall i'd recommend this TV for anyone looking for a large screen TV with a low budget. If Android on TV is needed then you should definitely avoid as you won't get any updates for Vidaa OS in near future.

Just go for this amazing budget tv, much better than Vu, hisense, nokia, mi and few more.... Race to compete with samsung lg and even sony in terms of picture quality and booting speed, I have lg, vu, Panasonic all 55 Inch at home, I found Toshiba a better than all the tv in price and picture quality, Design

Its an excellent TV with superb sound and very good WiFi connectivity . I use 50MBPS from Airtel and have not faced any lag with Netflix, YouTube or swapping between channels. The bezeless frame is very impressive and even the setting functions are impressive UI

Thanks to Flipkart for its best and prompt delivery just within two days after the booking,I got my TV in my home with same day installation. I purchased Toshiba 50U50 when their scheme of 4 years full warranty,And I git the na v very next day without any sratches or damage,Kudos to the delivery boys ,who were very helpful and understanding,they delivered my tv in heavy rains, without any hassles plus safety.The installation was also very quickly done with full safety measures , installation guy was very good in handling all the aspects of the installation.Talking about the Toshiba 50 inch TV, its best at this price plus me getting a 4 year warranty is like the cing on the cake.Picture quality is at its best, plus there are different picture modes so no need to set the picture.all the modes are ek se badhkar ek.coming to the sound ,it's Dolby,and it really shines in this department ,I am getting the best quality with my Motorola amphisound Home theater 5.1 via hdmi arc.whuch easily got connected.now my home has turned into a cinema hall with beautiful picture and amazing sound. Thanks to Toshiba for such a lovely TV.

Flipkart delivery is on time, but installation support is very poor. they will give a date while placing the order, but after delivery there is no proper support on installation of the TV. hence giving low rating.

Picture quality is good, (can't compare with top brands). Better than budget local models.
Sounds average. loudness excellent clarity average.
Connections are good, laptop and phone connects nicely.
NO app side loading or downloading, smart usage not satisfactory.
Very limited apps Netflix and prime. Google assistance not available. Alexa not useful here.
BT works OK remote OK. Not dual band WIFI, it is false clime.
FHD upscaling good, SD upscaling average.
At this Price 23.5k, value for money. You are not android freak, this is best buy.

Thanks to the Flipkart for speedy delivery and same day installation makes me super exited.

1) It was not like Android tv’s which takes ages to boot.
This tv runs with their os(LINUX). Extremely satisfied to setup so quickly and it turn on straight away.

2) Do not judge just because of it’s 1.5 gb ram, LINUX software do not need heaps of ram unlike android tv’s
1.5gb ram is quite sufficient.

3) Picture Quality is flawless. It does great as just like most expensive brands in the market. It has true colours as mentioned

4) People whoever sitting in bigger hall definitely need speakers though it has 30W output.

Toshiba just started by re-entering to INDIAN market where people look after for budget friendly appliances. Guys believe me I waited nearly 4 months since rumours started that Toshiba going to hit Indian market with UHD TV’s. I’m really satisfied and it’s worth every penny.

Note: I run my TV with Apple tv 4K which i must say Wowwwww.
People whoever having their 4K sticks they will truly get satisfied with picture quality.

Just one word go for it

Ordered on 18th of sept and got delivered on 20th so got 3 years of extra panel warranty. Tv is beyond my expectations. Reviewing after 9 days of usage

Pros
1. Dislpay: 5/5 excellent dispaly where Blacks are deeper and whites are brighter. Quality of hd channels will make you smile.
2. Sound: 5/5 sound is pretty loud and clear You will get the sub woofer effect in the theatre mode.
3. Connectivity: 5/5 there is no problem of connectivity till now wifi connection is very good and can access to each and every port very easily , screen mirroring is cherry 🍒 on the cake.
4. vidaa os: 5/5 the os is so optimised that things run on just a single click.
5. Delivery and installation: 5/5
6. Miss alexa: the feature is very useful you can ask for anything and get done by in a couple of seconds.
7. You can play your fav. Music with its screen off, a very convenient and good feature.
Cons
1. Sometimes alexa disconnects and need to sign out and sign in again I don't know why is this happening may be a net issue though it can be fixed in a software update.
2. As of now there is no hotstar but as company said there will an update in first quater of 2021 which includes almost all the other apps.

Worth every penny.

Not able to install Disney plus hotstar their is no Google Play Store if you want to watch disny plus hotstar, Sony live ,Zee,voot ect. You hav to connect with screen cast with your smartphones to smart tv theñ you can able to watch..

But for backlight bleeding issue, I would have given 5 stars. The picture quality and Software is top notch. Backlight bleeding affects real life performance in some backgrounds. If this issue is addressed and Hot star app is uploaded, Toshiba can really compete with even premium btands.

It has excellent black level and colors pops.
Before ads playback in youtube, when screen goes blank, it feels as if the tv is turned off, Black of this tv is that good !
Factory default colour settings are not good, after fine tuning the colour settings, it shines.
One of the best picture quality in budget segment, sole reason to buy this tv, excellent picture quality, same as samsung/LG.
My tv viewing time has doubled after buying this tv. It is pleasure to watch streaming content in this TV.
4K, Full HD, HD contents are treat to watch. SD contents are sufficiently upscaled , and looks descent, Not bad, not good.
Vidaa has very limited functionality and apps, but it is fast. My suggestion, use android box, or fire stick.
It is a VA panel, still no major color shift from any corner of my room. My room is moderate 12 by 10 feet sized.
Flipkart service was excellent, delivered before time, installed on same day of delivery.

After lot of thought I bought Toshiba U50. First thought was brand and then came specifications. The overall picture quality is really good, specially with different modes. The TV looks clean and has a firm design. The Vidaa operating system is smooth, though I doubt it will be as app savy as an android but really does the job with smooth support of few popular apps.
The sound system leaves a good impression and makes the TV apt for a hall setting.
I got 3 years additional warranty which was a plus point.

Why to buy
- Good Brand Image
- Picture Quality and Design
- Sound System
- Budget Range for a 55 or 50 inch TV

Features that can improve
- More RAM and inbuilt storage
- Dual Band wifi support
- More applications in app store

Overall I rate the tv a decent purchase.
